title: SIMPLY SMOKIN' PAELLA
directions: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and cook the onion for three to four minutes until softened and golden. Add the red pepper, garlic and rice and stir-fry for one minute.
Add the ham, stock, paprika and turmeric, bring to the boil and simmer for 12 minutes.
Stir in the prawns and peas, and cook for a further three to four minutes until the rice and vegetables are tender.
Season to taste, then divide between four serving plates and serve immediately. Ooh, how about a glass of Rioja?
ingredients: INGREDIENTS: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil; 1 onion, sliced; 1 red pepper, seeded and diced; 1 garlic clove, crushed; 200g (7oz) long-grain rice; 175g (6oz) smoked ham, roughly diced; 900ml (11/2 pints) chicken or vegetable stock; 1/2 teaspoon each paprika and turmeric; 175g (6oz) large prawns, thawed if frozen; 100g (4oz) frozen peas; salt and pepper.
